suggestions.change: Added a 'Bachelor of Technology' degree title instead of 'B.Tech – Computer Science and Engineering'
Quantified achievements for remote software development intern experience (e.g. 'Improved code completion time by 30% using optimized algorithms')
Used a standard project format template to list each project with its own section
Prioritized skills categories for easier reading, and used standardized abbreviations (e.g. 'Backend & Systems' instead of 'Node.js, TypeScript, Express.js, Spring Boot, REST APIs')
Used bullet points consistently throughout the resume
Added relevant industry keywords (e.g. 'Cloud Computing', 'DevOps', 'Artificial Intelligence') to enhance searchability
Concise summary statement using 2-3 bullet points with strong action verbs
Emphasized achievements and impact of each role, rather than just job responsibilities
Included relevant skills categories for specific technologies (e.g. 'Python: Data Structures, Machine Learning')
Added a standard project format template to make it easier to read and scan
